title: Need some help!
body: So, I have only been playing League for a week now and I am addicted, but of course a game problem has already occured and I CANNOT play the game. This is basically what it is, I can load the client, I can load the menus and I can choose champion but as soon as the game opens, it is just a black screen, no loading screen, no nothing. And then the bullshit part is that it says its a problem with my internet and I should restart my router, yet my internet is fine, I can watch YouTube, I can play other online games but LoL doesn't connect, any help would be appreciated!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me,

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.
